name: Furgles
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Furgles

By:EndergamingEpic

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

OVER 2+ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY!

TIME TAKEN TO MAKE:30+Hours over 3 Months!

This game is very complex so be warned if you don't get how to play. I tried to make it as easy as possible.

Collect fluffy little friends while you mine for crystals and fight enemies! Mine crystals for dust and turn them into gems to buy upgrades, powerups, and new Furgles! There are many different Furgles to collect as you grind your way to escaping the mine!

Tutorial in game.
